name: Nabi (mrblacksoot)
description:
The game Nabi aims to create an experience for the players. Not following a predetermined path or chasing collectables for completion, but to trigger curiosity and the sense of adventure. Not fighting the bad-guy in a black-white universe, but to ask yourself if the direct confrontation is really the only solution in a situation.

As a setting, feudal Korea was chosen. Korea does not need to hide between its two great neighbours, its rich culture however has not been featured in many games yet.

Read more at https://mrblacksoot.wordpress.com/nabi.
